original_text: Then David the king stood up upon his feet, and said, Hear me, my brethren, and my people: As for me, I had in mine heart to build an house of rest for the ark of the covenant of the Lord, and for the footstool of our God, and had made ready for the building:
korean_text: 이에 다윗 왕이 일어서서 이르되 나의 형제들, 나의 백성들아 내 말을 들으라 나는 여호와의 언약궤 곧 우리 하나님의 발판을 봉안할 성전을 건축할 마음이 있어서 건축할 재료를 준비하였으나

sentences.original_text: Then David the king stood up upon his feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다윗 왕이 자기 발 위에 일어서서

sentences.original_text: and said, Hear me, my brethren, and my people:
sentences.korean_translation: 말하되 나의 형제들과 나의 백성들아 나를 들으라

sentences.original_text: As for me, I had in mine heart
to build an house of rest
for the ark of the covenant of the Lord
and for the footstool of our God
and had made ready for the building:
